snippet.title: Bread and Fred - Official PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Bread & Fred is available now on PC. Watch the launch trailer to see the adorable penguins make their way through various levels in this co-op platformer game.

In Bread & Fred, you can play couch co-op and online multiplayer via Steam remote play to help two penguins, Bread & Fred, reach the top of the snow-capped summit. Time your jumps, cling to walls, swing across gaps & between platforms to see how far you can make it before you tumble all the way back down the mountain. You can also grab Jeff (who's a rock) to try out the game's single-player campaign.
